sections.heading: Concealment of livestock killed or injured by railroad or motor vehicle; classification3-1297
sections.text: Concealment of livestock killed or injured by railroad or motor vehicle; classificationA person who buries, removes or in any manner conceals livestock killed or injured by locomotives or cars of a railroad
